str2: The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Jewish. From Iouda; Judaean, i.e. Belonging to Jehudah.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: (a) intrans: I wonder, marvel, (b) trans: I wonder at, admire. From thauma; to wonder; by implication, to admire.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.
Adverb from the base of pou; an interrogative particle of manner; in what way?; also as exclamation, how much!

parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular

str2: From grapho; a writing, i.e. A letter, note, epistle, book, etc. plural learning.
Not, lest. A primary particle of qualified negation; not, lest; also (whereas ou expects an affirmative one) whether.

parse: Verb - Perfect Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: Prolongation from a primary verb, another form of which, matheo, is used as an alternate in certain tenses; to learn.
